title: The Saint Who Has Been Summoned to Another World Just Cries and While Saying, “My Boyfriend Is Dead!” by the Way, That Dead Boyfriend Is Me From the Previous Life - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Gods   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Reincarnation   Royalty   Saints   Special Abilities   Summoning Magic
author: Hanaka Yui   花果 唯
description:
Edward was reincarnated and lived freely as the third prince of the peaceful island nation of Astraea, but his life changed drastically with the appearance of a saint summoned by a goddess.

The saint, whose mental state manifests in the form of weather, has chosen Edward, a simple man, to be her caretaker instead of his more handsome brothers…

It was not only troublesome but also a great responsibility to take care of a saint who keeps abandoning the mission given to her by the goddess, crying, and making it rain all the time!

When I asked her why she was crying, she replied, “My boyfriend died!”

But, I know she wouldn't cry for that reason.

Because that dead boyfriend was me in a previous life.

>
